episodes.title: Thoughts on "Heaven's Gate: America's UFO Religion" by Benjamin E. Zeller
episodes.description: Heaven's Gate: America's UFO Religion is a 2014 text by religious studies scholar Benjamin E. Zeller. I am currently writing an article commemorating the tenth anniversary of this book. In this video, I talk about what I'm trying to achieve with the piece I'm working on, and what kinds of questions are guiding my research as of late.

episodes.description: The final installment in Season 1 of "In Search of Heaven's Gate". In this finale, we explore how and why the Heaven's Gate belief system culminated in one of the most shocking events of the 1990s.

episodes.title: Heaven's Gate - The Next Generation? | Conversation w/ a Contemporary Believer (Alex)
episodes.description:
Alex is a musician and a contemporary believer in Heaven's Gate, a UFO religion that was active primarily between 1975 and 1997.  You can find his music on Sound Cloud at Beyond Death Records and on Instagram at Kingdom_Of_Heaven_423

Disclaimer: The views expressed here are those of the person giving them.

episodes.title: Heaven’s Gate Interview (3/4) | Special Terminology and the “Overcoming Process”
Heaven’s Gate Interview (2/4) | Life on “The Craft”
episodes.description:
The "Craft" was the term used by the Heaven's Gate group to refer to their residence in California. (As in, "space craft"). In this part of the interview, I ask Sawyer about how conflicts or disputes between members were handled, while Cathy relays a story concerning disagreements in "the nutra-lab" (the kitchen). 

Photo: “Heavens Gate Cult Mansion” (2009) oil on canvas, by Eric Edward Esper
Find more of Esper's work here: https://ericesper.com/home.html 

You know, I looked far and wide for a picture of the mansion by itself, without ambulances, media, and other morbid imagery surrounding it. The only one I could find was this oil painting. I've seen an AI-generated image of the mansion floating around, and that image seems to have relied heavily on Esper's oil painting. But then, even the AI-generated image adds in the ambulances and the police cars and what not. I don't know. Make of that what you will.
